metatags.twitter:title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)
metatags.twitter:description: FERPA protects educational privacy by safeguarding student records. Students have the right to review their records and request amendments to the records.
metatags.og:title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)
metatags.og:description: FERPA protects educational privacy by safeguarding student records. Students have the right to review their records and request amendments to the records.
